content:
Whenever I do rustup update, when rustup is updating clippy I get this message:

info: Defaulting to 500.0 MiB unpack ram

What does this mean?

Here it is in context:

info: installing component 'clippy'
info: Defaulting to 500.0 MiB unpack ram
info: installing component 'rustc-dev'
 95.5 MiB /  95.5 MiB (100 %)  13.6 MiB/s in  7s ETA:  0s

Camelid said:

Here it is in context:

info: installing component 'clippy'
info: Defaulting to 500.0 MiB unpack ram
info: installing component 'rustc-dev'
 95.5 MiB /  95.5 MiB (100 %)  13.6 MiB/s in  7s ETA:  0s

I presume that's the quantity of scratch memory allocated to decompressing the components after they have been downloaded.
seems like that would be more like debug-level information
